sn35.101:4.1: “Yaṃ, bhikkhave, na tumhākaṃ, taṃ pajahatha.
sn35.101:4.2: Taṃ vo pahīnaṃ hitāya sukhāya bhavissati.
sn35.101:4.6: Taṃ vo pahīnaṃ hitāya sukhāya bhavissati.
sn35.101:4.9: Te vo pahīnā hitāya sukhāya bhavissanti.
sn35.101:4.12: Taṃ vo pahīnaṃ hitāya sukhāya bhavissati.
sn35.101:4.15: So vo pahīno hitāya sukhāya bhavissati.
sn35.101:4.16: Yampidaṃ cakkhusamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tampi na tumhākaṃ.
sn35.101:4.18: Taṃ vo pahīnaṃ hitāya sukhāya bhavissati.
sn35.101:5.3: Sā vo pahīnā hitāya sukhāya bhavissati.
sn35.101:5.6: Te vo pahīnā hitāya sukhāya bhavissanti.
sn35.101:5.9: Taṃ vo pahīnaṃ hitāya sukhāya bhavissati.
sn35.101:5.12: So vo pahīno hitāya sukhāya bhavissati.
sn35.101:5.13: Yampidaṃ jivhāsamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tampi na tumhākaṃ.
sn35.101:5.15: Taṃ vo pahīnaṃ hitāya sukhāya bhavissati … pe ….
sn35.101:6.3: So vo pahīno hitāya sukhāya bhavissati.
sn35.101:6.6: Te vo pahīnā hitāya sukhāya bhavissanti.
sn35.101:6.9: Taṃ vo pahīnaṃ hitāya sukhāya bhavissati.
sn35.101:6.12: So vo pahīno hitāya sukhāya bhavissati.
sn35.101:6.13: Yampidaṃ manosamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tampi na tumhākaṃ.
sn35.101:6.15: Taṃ vo pahīnaṃ hitāya sukhāya bhavissati.
sn35.101:7.1: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, yaṃ imasmiṃ jetavane tiṇakaṭṭhasākhāpalāsaṃ taṃ jano hareyya vā ḍaheyya vā yathāpaccayaṃ vā kareyya, api nu tumhākaṃ evamassa:
sn35.101:7.2: ‘amhe jano harati vā ḍahati vā yathāpaccayaṃ vā karotī’”ti?
sn35.101:10.1: “Na hi no etaṃ, bhante, attā vā attaniyaṃ vā”ti.
sn35.101:11.3: Taṃ vo pahīnaṃ hitāya sukhāya bhavissati.
sn35.101:11.7: yampidaṃ manosamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tampi na tumhākaṃ.
sn35.101:11.9: Taṃ vo pahīnaṃ hitāya sukhāya bhavissatī”ti.
